resources.name: CCometixLine - Claude Code Statusline
resources.description: A high-performance Claude Code statusline tool written in Rust with Git integration, usage tracking, interactive TUI configuration, and Claude Code enhancement utilities.
resources.author: Haleclipse

resources.name: ccstatusline
resources.description: A highly customizable status line formatter for Claude Code CLI that displays model info, git branch, token usage, and other metrics in your terminal.
resources.author: sirmalloc

resources.name: claude-code-statusline
resources.description: Enhanced 4-line statusline for Claude Code with themes, cost tracking, and MCP server monitoring
resources.author: rz1989s

resources.name: claude-powerline
resources.description: A vim-style powerline statusline for Claude Code with real-time usage tracking, git integration, custom themes, and more
resources.author: Owloops

resources.name: claudia-statusline
resources.description: High-performance Rust-based statusline for Claude Code with persistent stats tracking, progress bars, and optional cloud sync. Features SQLite-first persistence, git integration, context progress bars, burn rate calculation, XDG-compliant with theme support (dark/light, NO_COLOR).
resources.author: Hagan Franks
